EmailTemplate.name: Restaurant Week- Newspaper Markets
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing DealChicken Restaurant Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wrap up the backyard BBQs and invite customers to enjoy the last days of summer at your restaurant... during DealChicken Restaurant Week. Unlike a traditional restaurant week, you won't have a rush of customers during one week - their visits will be spaced out over the time your promotion is valid, typically 6 months.
Restaurant deals are very popular with DealChicken users - it's our #1 category! A promotional offer is a great way to introduce new customers to your restaurant. For more information, download our Restaurant Week information sheet.
To reserve one of eight featured Restaurant Week positions, contact {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} by August 16th at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great dining deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your restaurant. Merchants receive a revenue split less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
Why try DealChicken? Hear how DealChicken has helped bring local customers to area restaurants
